title: Fuel Price Excise Duty Cut Burden Entirely On Central Government, Says Finance Minister - NDTV Profit
content:
1. Fuel Price Excise Duty Cut Burden Entirely On Central Government, Says Finance Minister  NDTV Profit
  2. Centre didn’t ask before hiking fuel prices; why exhort states to cut VAT now, asks TN finance minister  India Today
  3. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman clarifies that only the center will bear the burden of excise duty reduction on fuel, hits out at the opposition’s false claims  OpIndia
  4. 'People first for us': PM Modi after finance minister slashes fuel prices, offers LPG subsidies  Hindustan Times
  5. Fuel prices not dropped naturally, Kerala also slashed tax: Finance Minister  Mathrubhumi English
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Sunday said that excise duty reduction has entirely been made in road and infrastructure cess
